languages.text: "Как насчет освежиться после смены. Говорят, в "Приюте" появилась нормальная обскура".
"How about we get some rest and relax after the shift? I heard they've got some decent obscura in the Cove now."
languages.original_text: "Как насчет освежиться после смены. Говорят, в "Приюте" появилась нормальная обскура".

traits.locale_text: "How about we get some rest and relax after the shift. They say there is fine obscura in 'The Shelter' now".
"How about we get some rest and relax after the shift. They say there is fine obscura in 'The Shelter' now".
"How about we get some rest and relax after the shift? I heard they've got some decent obscura in the Cove now."
"How about we get some rest and relax after the shift? I heard they've got some decent obscura in the Cove now."
"How about we get some rest and relax after the shift? I heard they've got some decent obscura in the Cove now."

languages.text: “换班之后咱们去休息休息，放松一下怎么样？我听说酒吧里弄到了相当不错的迷酊。”
languages.original_text: "How about we get some rest and relax after the shift? I heard they've got some decent obscura in the Cove now."

traits.locale_text: “换班之后咱们去休息休息，放松一下怎么样？我听说酒吧里弄到了相当不错的迷酊。”

languages.text: «Oye, ¿quieres descansar un poco después de este turno? Por lo que dicen, ahora tenemos obscura del bueno en la Cala».
languages.original_text: "How about we get some rest and relax after the shift? I heard they've got some decent obscura in the Cove now."

traits.locale_text: «Oye, ¿quieres descansar un poco después de este turno? Por lo que dicen, ahora tenemos obscura del bueno en la Cala».

languages.text: 「シフトが終わったら、ゆっくり休まないか？コーブに中々のオブスキュラが入ったらしい」
languages.original_text: "How about we get some rest and relax after the shift? I heard they've got some decent obscura in the Cove now."

traits.locale_text: 「シフトが終わったら、ゆっくり休まないか？コーブに中々のオブスキュラが入ったらしい」

languages.text: "Wie wäre es, wenn wir uns nach der Schicht ein wenig entspannen? Im Cove soll es jetzt ein recht anständiges Obscura geben."
languages.original_text: "How about we get some rest and relax after the shift? I heard they've got some decent obscura in the Cove now."

traits.locale_text: "Wie wäre es, wenn wir uns nach der Schicht ein wenig entspannen? Im Cove soll es jetzt ein recht anständiges Obscura geben."

languages.text: « Et si on prenait un peu de bon temps après le service ? Il paraît qu'on trouve de l'obscura à peu près potable maintenant, dans l'Anse. »
languages.original_text: "How about we get some rest and relax after the shift? I heard they've got some decent obscura in the Cove now."

traits.locale_text: « Et si on prenait un peu de bon temps après le service ? Il paraît qu'on trouve de l'obscura à peu près potable maintenant, dans l'Anse. »

languages.text: "Vardiya sonrası biraz dinlenip rahatlamaya ne dersin? Kovuk'ta sağlam obsküralar varmış diye duydum."
languages.original_text: "How about we get some rest and relax after the shift? I heard they've got some decent obscura in the Cove now."

traits.locale_text: "Vardiya sonrası biraz dinlenip rahatlamaya ne dersin? Kovuk'ta sağlam obsküraları varmış diye duydum."
